gradeDescription: A = I excelled at everything I did today!
whatIDidToday: played with as many buddies as possible
noteworthyComments: Happy Friday!!! I had a great day today. We started off our day relaxing with our classmates. Later we went outside to play and run around. I had the best time. Afterwards we had our training exercise working on agility and confidence building. I did great!! We ended our day with a nap and playing with some toys.
